CONFIG.ua: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/130.0.0.0 Safari/537.36 Edg/130.0.0.0

values: 提起；举起；抬起（身体某一部位）；空运；解除；撤销；偷盗；盗窃；剽窃；抄袭；拔起（蔬菜或植物）；高兴起来；使更愉快；（个人、运动队的）晋级；赢得（奖品或比赛）
电梯；升降机；起重机；抬升装置；免费搭车；搭便车；振奋；鼓舞；抬；提；升力；剽窃；挖出；刨出；拔起（蔬菜或植物）；高兴起来；偷盗

synonym.mean: 举起；提升；鼓舞；空运；抄袭

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 升降机；举重运动员；小偷

word_mean_info__list.difference: 书面用词，多用于诗歌或比喻中，具有特殊的修辞色彩。
及物动词，常用词，多指把某物从低处升到高处，有时作引申用。
普通用词，指具体的或抽象的事物由低向高移动。
语气比raise强，指用体力或机械的力举起或抬起某物。
较正式用词，指位置、高度的升高，多作比喻用，指职位、品德等的提高。
较正式用词，常可与lift换用，但强调把某物举起或抬起到应有的高度。常用比喻。
多指用绳索、滑轮等机械把重物升起。
指需花大力气或借外力才能举起或抬起重物。
指用人力或机械力把某物升到较高的位置。
原义指从后面或下面推起或提高，现常用于指提高价格、振作精神等抽象概念。

bilingual.source: It is hard to lift stones this size.
bilingual.target: 把这么大的石头举起来很费力。

bilingual.source: How heavy a barbell can you lift?
He tried hard to lift the stone.
bilingual.target: 他努力举起了那块石头。
她轻松地举起了那个小包。

bilingual.source: He can lift 50 Kgs with one hand.
Bend your elbow to lift the weight.
bilingual.target: 弯曲你的肘部来举起重量。

list.abstract: lift是一个web框架，基于Scala编程语言，使用Apache 2.0 license许可发布。
《Lift》是芬兰乐队Poets of the fall 的一首歌曲。

yingyinNormal.en: I was a strong man once. I used to lift tractors.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我曾经是个大力士。我曾经举起过拖拉机。

yingyinNormal.en: I don't think it's heavy. I think it's some sort of magic, so only Thor can lift it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我觉得不是因为它重而是铁锤上有某种魔法，所以只有雷神才能举起它。

yingyinNormal.en: Yo, Bing. Racquetball in 15 minutes. Joey, be a pal. Lift up my hand and smack her with it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 唷，宾，二十分钟后打壁球。乔伊，好兄弟，举起我的手赏她一巴掌。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay, so, what you wanna do is lift the racket right on impact, so you get that nice top spin. Try and hit one.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好了，那么你要做的是举起球拍准备击球，那么你就能打出很好的开球了，试下开球看看。

yingyinNormal.en: How do you make them do that? Ants can lift objects 50 times their weight. They build, farm, they cooperate with each other.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你是怎么让它们做到的? 蚂蚁可以举起它们体重五十倍的东西，它们筑巢，翻土，它们之间相互配合。

yingyinNormal.en: Do I look like I lift weights? Not heavy ones.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你看我像练举重的人吗？举不了很重吧。

yingyinNormal.en: Rose! One, two, three, lift. Oh! I can manage.
yingyinNormal.zh: 罗斯！ 一、二、三、抬。我来吧。

yingyinNormal.en: Yeah, I'm saying, it'd be easier to lift a car.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我就是这个意思，抬车都比抬你妈容易。

yingyinNormal.en: Really? Yup. He can lift a thousand pounds. Shut up.
yingyinNormal.zh: 真的假的？真的，他能托举一千磅的重量。不是吧。

yingyinNormal.en: Is that paprikash? I thought it might lift your spirits.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那是辣椒粉吗？我想这或许能让你振奋精神。

yingyinNormal.en: You have to take the ski lift. The ski lift is carrying everyone to the top of snowy mountain.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你可以去坐滑雪缆车。缆车把所有人运到雪山上。

yingyinNormal.en: Ignition sequence starts Five, four, three, two, one. All engines running. Lift off, we have a lift off.
yingyinNormal.zh: 发射倒计时，五、四、三、二、一，点火，发射升空。成功升空了。

yingyinNormal.en: My office is on the top floor. We have to go up in the lift.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我的办公室在最上面一层，我们要坐电梯才能到。

yingyinNormal.en: My office is on the top floor. We have to go up in the lift.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我的办公室在最上面一层，我们要坐电梯才能到。

yingyinNormal.en: A lift for every fry. That is a major commitment to fried food.
yingyinNormal.zh: 吃一根撩起一次，为了油炸食品牺牲可真大。

yingyinNormal.en: Community singing is another sure fire way to lift the spirits.
yingyinNormal.zh: 合唱是另一种振作精神的好方法。

yingyinNormal.en: Honey, come on. You live far away, you're not related. You lift right out.
yingyinNormal.zh: 亲爱的，拜托，你住得远，又不是谁的亲戚，很快就会被淡忘。

yingyinNormal.en: But I can't tell you what a lift it is to hear that you'd like to. Really?
yingyinNormal.zh: 但你愿意邀请我，我还是很开心的。是吗？

yingyinNormal.en: I was filled with adrenaline. It happens to be how women lift cars off babies.
yingyinNormal.zh: 都是肾上腺素的作用，就像是母亲为了救出车下的婴儿，可以把车抬起来一样。

yingyinNormal.en: Now we lift the buckets. Hey presto. Richard has made a sand castle. Hey presto.
yingyinNormal.zh: 现在我们把水桶拿起来。好，变出来了！理查德做了一个沙堡。变出来了！

exam_freq_info.chinese: 提; 举; 解除; 升起; 消散
拿起; 移开; 运输

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 提升的；精神振奋的

word_family.mean: v. 抬起；举起；拿起来放到…；振奋精神；鼓励；鼓舞；解除；偷；顺手牵羊；空运

sense_info_list.zh: 提; 举; 解除; 升起; 消散

examination_example.sentence: You were <highlight>lifting</highlight> 10-pound dumbbells for three sets of 10 reps every day.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你每天举三组十磅重的哑铃，每组十次。

examination_example.sentence: 60,000 extra new homes could be built over the next five years if the cap were <highlight>lifted</highlight>, increasing GDP by 0.6%.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果上限被废除，在接下来的五年里将会有6万套额外的新房子被建造，GDP将会增长0.6%。

sense_info_list.en: raise to a higher position or level
a free ride in another person's vehicle
(of a cloud, fog, or others) move upward or away
pick up and move to a different position
sense_info_list.zh: 拿起; 移开; 运输

sense_info_list.en: raise a person's spirits or confidence
use a person's work or ideas without permission or acknowledgment
steal something, especially a minor item of property
a device incorporating a moving cable for carrying people, typically skiers, up or down a mountain

word_usage.usage: lift作动词时，既可作及物动词，又可作不及物动词。作及物动词时，其后通常接表示人的名词或者代词，如：lift the box，；也可用于被动结构

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 意为“升高、提高、举起”，侧重于将重物提起离开地面。
意为“提起、升起”，常指用机器设备将某物升起、绞起。
意为“举起、抬起、提升、晋升”。

disambiguation.sense_group: 举起; 提高; 抬起

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: raise to a higher position or level
(of a cloud, fog, or others) move upward or away
a free ride in another person's vehicle
a device incorporating a moving cable for carrying people, typically skiers, up or down a mountain

word_usage.usage: 指“电梯”时，lift是英式英语，而elevator是美式英语。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 拿起; 移开; 运输
抬高价格; 提高数量

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: raise to a higher position or level

examination_example.sentence: I've never tried weight-<highlight>lifting</highlight> before.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我以前从未尝试过举重。

examination_example.sentence: She knows the basics of weight-<highlight>lifting</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她知道举重的基本知识。

examination_example.sentence: The safety of weight-<highlight>lifting</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 举重的安全性。

sense_info_list.en: pick up and move to a different position
sense_info_list.zh: 拿起; 移开; 运输

examination_example.sentence: It is impossible for Americans to <highlight>lift</highlight> themselves out of poverty entirely their own.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 美国人完全靠自己的力量摆脱贫困是不可能的。

examination_example.sentence: The train was coming around the corner as I <highlight>lifted</highlight> the baby from the tracks.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当我把婴儿从铁轨上抱起来时，火车正从拐角处驶来。

examination_example.sentence: Listen, do you want a <highlight>lift</highlight> to the city?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 听着，你想搭车去市里吗？

sense_info_list.en: increase a price or amount
sense_info_list.zh: 抬高价格; 提高数量

word_usage.usage: 指“电梯”时，lift是英式英语，而elevator是美式英语。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 举起; 搬起; 抬起; 提高

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Our building even had a tiny <highlight>lift</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们的大楼甚至还有一个小电梯。

examination_example.sentence: We've all been there: in a <highlight>lift</highlight>, in line at the bank or on airplane, surrounded by people who are, like us.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们都去过那里：在电梯里，在银行排队，或在飞机上，周围都是和我们一样的人。

examination_example.sentence: Apr 8: Wuhan <highlight>lifted</highlight> outbound traffic restrictions.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 4月8日：武汉取消对外交通管控。

sense_info_list.zh: 举起; 搬起; 抬起; 提高

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 提升的；精神振奋的

word_family.mean: v. 抬起；举起；拿起来放到…；振奋精神；鼓励；鼓舞；解除；偷；顺手牵羊；空运

sense_info_list.en: raise to a higher position or level

examination_example.sentence: Amy helped them <highlight>lift</highlight> Roy into the truck, then they drove down the hillside towards the hospital.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 艾米帮助他们把罗伊抬进卡车，然后他们沿着山坡向医院驶去。

examination_example.sentence: Remember when lifting a backpack, or anything, to <highlight>lift</highlight> using the arms and legs and to bend at the knees.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 记住，当举起背包或任何东西时，要用胳膊和腿提起，膝盖弯曲。

examination_example.sentence: Once dishes come, we take out our mobile phones and take photos instead of <highlight>lifting</highlight> our chopsticks.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一旦菜来了，我们就拿出手机拍照，而不是拿起筷子。

sense_info_list.en: a device incorporating a moving cable for carrying people, typically skiers, up or down a mountain

examination_example.sentence: How many <highlight>lifts</highlight> are used to carry people up and down?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有多少部电梯用来载人上下?

examination_example.sentence: Although most of the reports weren't finished, she got into the <highlight>lift</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 尽管大部分报告还没有完成，她还是进了电梯。

examination_example.sentence: She took the <highlight>lift</highlight> to the 11th floor(楼层), and a clerk showed her where her desk was.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她乘电梯到了11楼，一位职员指给她看她的办公桌在哪里。

sense_info_list.en: raise a person's spirits or confidence

examination_example.sentence: A walk in the fresh air can <highlight>lift</highlight> your mood after a stressful day's work.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在一天紧张的工作后，在新鲜空气中散步可以提升你的情绪。

examination_example.sentence: It also <highlight>lifts</highlight> everyone's spirits.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它也能振奋每个人的精神。

examination_example.sentence: He <highlight>lift</highlight> his beard from under the quilt and put it above it．
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他从被子底下抽出胡子，把它放在上面。

examination_example.sentence: AI is already doing the work that people used to do, such as assembling (装配) cars, digging the coal and <highlight>lifting</highlight> goods.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 人工智能已经在做人们过去做的工作，比如组装汽车、挖煤和搬运货物。

sense_info_list.en: to take hold of somebody/something and move them/it to a different position

examination_example.sentence: They <highlight>lift</highlight> people up.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们鼓舞人们。

sense_info_list.en: a free ride in a car, etc. to a place you want to get to

examination_example.sentence: Could you please give me a <highlight>lift</highlight>?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你能载我一程吗？

word_usage.usage: 指“电梯”时，lift是英式英语，而elevator是美式英语。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 指用体力或机械将人或事物举起；也指抬起某一身体部位。
常指用体力将某事物抬高或举高；也指抬起眼睛、头或脸以向上看。
